item.title: [GRA1][DedicatedServers] - Rack G103A04
item.description:
Sep 13, 01:27 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/09/2022 01:00 UTC
End Time : 13/09/2022 01:25 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. The equipment has been replaced. All impacted servers are up and operational.

Sep 13, 01:05 UTC
Identified - Start time : 13/09/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : remote reboot device malfunction
Ongoing actions : replacement of the impacted equipment
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - R710B14
item.description:
Sep 12, 11:13 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/09/2022 10:20 UTC
End Time : 12/09/2022 11:07 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the affected rack are operational again.
Root cause : Incident caused by an issue on electrical equipmement.

Sep 12, 09:19 UTC
Identified - Start time : 12/09/2022 10:20 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack R710B14 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Incident caused by an issue on electrical equipmement.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working on a fix.

Sep 12, 08:28 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 12/09/2022 10:20 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack R710B14 are currently unreachable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the cause of this issue.

Sep 12, 11:02 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/09/2022 07:38 UTC

Update - Update : 90% of impacted servers are operational again. Our teams continue to work on the remaining ones.

Sep 12, 08:07 UTC
Identified - Start time : 12/09/2022 07:38 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack G104A08 are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Incident caused by an issue on a cooling system module.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently working on a fix.
